remarks: Define the functional part of a class ` F ` .  This is the maximal part of ` F ` that is a function.  See ~ funpartfun and ~ funpartfv for the meaning of this statement.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2014.)
statement: df-funpart $p |- Funpart F = ( F |` dom ( ( Image F o. Singleton ) i^i ( _V X. Singletons ) ) ) $.
